meanings.definition: All the visible features of an area of land, often considered in terms of their aesthetic appeal.
meanings.sent1: The vast landscape was filled with rolling hills and colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: She painted a beautiful landscape of the mountains and the lake.
meanings.sent3: The landscape seemed to smile back at the artist as she painted.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a landscape of memories, each one a different color.
meanings.sent5: The landscape stretched out before them like a never-ending storybook.

meanings.definition: A painting or photograph of a landscape.
meanings.sent1: The artist's landscape captured the beauty of the countryside.
meanings.sent2: I hung a new landscape in my living room to brighten up the space.
meanings.sent3: The landscape in the painting seemed to come alive at night.
meanings.sent4: Her photograph of the landscape was like a window to another world.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the landscape painting danced together in harmony.

meanings.definition: To improve the appearance of an area of land by altering its contours, adding ornamental features, etc.
meanings.sent1: They decided to landscape their backyard to create a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent2: The company was hired to landscape the park and make it more inviting.
meanings.sent3: He tried to landscape his front yard with giant plastic flamingos.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds as she landscaped the garden with seashells.
meanings.sent5: The landscaped area looked like a mini paradise in the middle of the city.
